Package entity.daemons

Class GameTimerDaemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.PhantomEntity
        • entity.daemons.GameTimerDaemon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    public class GameTimerDaemon
extends PhantomEntity
implements Updatable
    This is a class used to show attributes of players and time left before the game end.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(double ticksPassed)
        Update the game. If remaining time run out, then end the game. If not, update time showed on screen to be real remaining time left.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Parameters:
        ticksPassed - Frame rate

      • end

        private void end()
        End this game GameSingleton.destroy(). Play soundtrack music of the end scene.
